I'm a mathematician and data scientist from Turkey. I have experience in 
developing and building end-to-end data science solutions. 
My interests are data science, numerical analysis, dynamical systems and chaos,
and mathematical/statistical modeling.

When not playing with data, I'm enjoying spending time playing music and 
working on digital art paintings.
